World.Name: Adam
World.Entry: December, 1050: Adam learns how to hold a breath January, 1051: Adam can loot items from a corpse February, 1051: Adam can steal from a bag in the same room if the target isn't present March, 1051: Adam is in Pickpocket Training and practicing existing skills April, 1051: Adam can use the 'what's that behind you?' distraction technique May, 1051: Adam can bump into people to take a random item from the target
